column2: HF Foods Group, Inc. is a foodservice distributor, which markets and distributes fresh produces, frozen & dry food and non-food products to Asian or Chinese restaurants and other foodservice customers throughout the Southeast region of the United States. The company is headquartered in New York City, New York. The firm through its subsidiary, HF Group Holding Corporation is a food service distributor. The firm offers its foodservices to Asian/Chinese restaurants in southeastern United States. The firm serves over 3,200 restaurants across 10 states.
